portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 猫エラー ＰＯＳ＿ＴＥＭＰが セットされてない
portrait_l.ascii: Cat error. PUSS-TEMP is not set.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロちゃんが いなくなったの でも
portrait_l.ascii: Whitney has disappeared. But

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: あの猫からは、強い意志を感じたわ 使命を持ってどこかへ旅立った そんな気がするの
portrait_l.ascii: I don't think she's lost. I think she set out on a journey on her own.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: それに、お友達を 紹介してくれたみたい ああ～しあわせ
portrait_l.ascii: And it looks like I've found a new friend. Aah~ This is true happiness.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかにかわいい猫いないかしら
portrait_l.ascii: Is there a cute cat anywhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 世の中には ２種類の人がいると思うの
portrait_l.ascii: I think there's two kinds of people in the world.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 猫が好きな人と そうじゃない人よ
portrait_l.ascii: Ones who like cats, and ones who don't.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: あなたはどっち？
portrait_l.ascii: Which one are you?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロがボクの前から 居なくなってしまった
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, have you seen a white cat?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: だけど、あの時のシロの後ろ姿には 旅立つ決意を感じたんだ
portrait_l.ascii: I think they're crying for help.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロと別れたことは、 つらいけど
portrait_l.ascii: It's hard being apart from Whitney.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 代わりに居ついた こいつと仲良くしていくよ
portrait_l.ascii: I'll have to get along with the one left in her place.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかにかわいい猫いませんか
portrait_l.ascii: Is there a cute cat anywhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロは、どこへいって しまったのじゃろう
portrait_l.ascii: Whitney went off somewhere

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 不思議と安心じゃ どこかで元気にしている気がするんじゃ
portrait_l.ascii: Mysteriously, I'm at peace. I'm happy for them.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: それに、お友達を 紹介してくれたみたいじゃの ああ～しあわせ
portrait_l.ascii: And it looks like they got new friends. Aah~ I'm quite happy.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかにかわいい猫いないかの さびしいわい
portrait_l.ascii: Is there a cute cat anywhere? I'm so lonely.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: ふらっとウチに来て、 ふらっと、どこかへいっちゃった
portrait_l.ascii: They suddenly showed up at our home and suddenly went off somewhere.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 不思議ね、は どこかで元気にやってる気がするの
portrait_l.ascii: It feels like is doing fine, wherever they are.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: かわりに、お友達をつれて きてくれたみたい
portrait_l.ascii: In exchange, it looks like they brought their friends.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかにかわいい猫いないかな
portrait_l.ascii: Is there a cute cat anywhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: ねぇ、どこかで、白い猫を 見なかった？
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, have you seen a white cat somewhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかで、助けを求めて 鳴いているような気がするの
portrait_l.ascii: I think I can hear one crying for help.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: おかえり～ シロちゃん
portrait_l.ascii: Welcome back, Whitney~

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: あら、ごめんなさい うれしくって、つい夢中になっちゃった
portrait_l.ascii: Oh, I'm sorry. I was so happy, I just fell into a trance.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: お礼に、これをあげるわ
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you this as a reward.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: もう、危ないところにいっちゃだめよ～
portrait_l.ascii: Don't go anywhere dangerous anymore~

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: もう、危ないところにいっちゃだめよ～
portrait_l.ascii: Don't go anywhere dangerous anymore~

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロちゃんが いなくなったの でも
portrait_l.ascii: Whitney has disappeared. But

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: あの猫からは、強い意志を感じたわ 使命を持ってどこかへ旅立った そんな気がするの
portrait_l.ascii: I felt strong determination from it. They set out with a journey in mind. That is what I think.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: それに、お友達を 紹介してくれたみたい ああ～しあわせ
portrait_l.ascii: And it looks like they got new friends. Aah~ I'm quite happy.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかにかわいい猫いないかしら
portrait_l.ascii: Is there a cute cat anywhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 世の中には ２種類の人がいると思うの
portrait_l.ascii: I think there's two kinds of people in the world.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 猫が好きな人と そうじゃない人よ
portrait_l.ascii: Ones who like cats, and ones who don't.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: あなたはどっち？
portrait_l.ascii: Which one are you?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: なぁ、どこかで、白い猫を 見なかったか？
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, have you seen a white cat somewhere?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: どこかで、助けを求めて 鳴いているような気がするんだ
portrait_l.ascii: I think I can hear one crying for help.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: おお～シロや～～
portrait_l.ascii: Ooh, Oh, Whitney~~

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: あっ
portrait_l.ascii: Ah.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: お礼といっちゃなんだが これを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: I can't thank you enough. Please, take this.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: もう、 危ないところにいっちゃだめだよ～
portrait_l.ascii: Alright Whitney, no more getting yourself into trouble now~

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: もう、 危ないところにいっちゃだめだよ～
portrait_l.ascii: Alright Whitney, no more getting yourself into trouble now~

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロがボクの前から 居なくなってしまった
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, have you seen a white cat?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: だけど、あの時のシロの後ろ姿には 旅立つ決意を感じたんだ
portrait_l.ascii: I think they're crying for help.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロと別れたことは、 つらいけど
portrait_l.ascii: It's hard being apart from Whitney.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 代わりに居ついた こいつと仲良くしていくよ
portrait_l.ascii: I'll have to get along with the one left in her place.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかにかわいい猫いませんか
portrait_l.ascii: Is there a cute cat anywhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: ねぇ、どこかで、白い猫を 見なかったかい？
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, have you seen a white cat somewhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: ついこの間、帰ってきたばかりなのに また、居なくなってしまったんじゃ
portrait_l.ascii: They came back the other day, but disappeared again

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかで、助けを求めて 鳴いているような気がするんじゃ
portrait_l.ascii: I think I can hear one crying for help.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: おお、よしよし
portrait_l.ascii: Ohh, there, there.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: すまないねぇ、 お礼といっちゃなんだけど これを受け取ってくれ
portrait_l.ascii: I'm sorry. I don't think this is enough, but accept this as thanks.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: もう、危ないところに いくんじゃないよ
portrait_l.ascii: Don't go anywhere dangerous anymore~

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: もう、危ないところに いくんじゃないよ
portrait_l.ascii: Don't go anywhere dangerous anymore~

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロは、どこへいって しまったのじゃろう
portrait_l.ascii: Whitney went off somewhere

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 不思議と安心じゃ どこかで元気にしている気がするんじゃ
portrait_l.ascii: Mysteriously, I'm at peace. I'm happy for them.

portrait_l.ascii: And it looks like they got new friends. Aah~ I'm quite happy.

portrait_l.ascii: Is there a cute cat anywhere? I'm so lonely.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: ねぇ、どこかで、白い猫を 見なかった？
portrait_l.ascii: Hey, have you seen a white cat somewhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかで、助けを求めて 鳴いているような気がするの
portrait_l.ascii: I think I can hear one crying for help.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: おかえり～
portrait_l.ascii: Welcome back, .

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: ん？ って、なまえ 変かしら
portrait_l.ascii: Mm? Would naming them be considered strange?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: お礼に、これをあげるね
portrait_l.ascii: I'll give you this as thanks.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: もう、危ないところにいっちゃだめよ～
portrait_l.ascii: Don't go anywhere dangerous anymore~

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: もう、危ないところにいっちゃだめよ～
portrait_l.ascii: Don't go anywhere dangerous anymore~

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: ふらっとウチに来て、 ふらっと、どこかへいっちゃった
portrait_l.ascii: They suddenly showed up at our home and suddenly went off somewhere.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 不思議ね、は どこかで元気にやってる気がするの
portrait_l.ascii: It feels like is doing fine, wherever they are.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: かわりに、お友達をつれて きてくれたみたい
portrait_l.ascii: In exchange, it looks like they brought their friends.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: どこかにかわいい猫いないかな
portrait_l.ascii: Is there a cute cat anywhere?

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: あなた、本物の猫好きの人ね 見れば分かるわ
portrait_l.ascii: You're a real cat lover. I can tell just looking at you.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: 猫好きの人に悪い人は いないわ
portrait_l.ascii: No cat lover is a bad person.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: そんな、あなたには これをプレゼントします
portrait_l.ascii: And so, I'll give you this, as a present.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: シロちゃんが、またたくさんお友達を 連れて帰ってきたの まるで、猫の王国みたいね
portrait_l.ascii: Whitney brought back a bunch of friends this time too. It's like a kingdom of cats.

portrait_l.name: cat lover
portrait_l.sjis: にゃー、にゃー
portrait_l.ascii: Meow, meow~
